plurals.description: Plural form content description for number of new notifications [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Manage your LeOS Messenger ID from within LeOS Messenger.
Please enter the LeOS Messenger ID of the contact you would like to add
Error adding shortcut to launcher screen
An error occurred sending one or more messages.
Hold on. The app will be restarted in a few seconds.
Note: The system’s character set may not be able to display all emojis supported by LeOS Messenger.

The server has detected two or more connections from different devices with the same LeOS Messenger ID.

It is not possible to use the same LeOS Messenger ID on several devices simultaneously. New messages are only transmitted to the device that last logged in to the server.

If you’re switching to a new device, please uninstall or disable %s on the old device and then reboot the new one.
Call disconnected due to complete audio focus loss.
Audio has been muted temporarily due to focus loss
Videos and files larger than %s will always be downloaded on demand
Include large media files (video, documents, original pictures)

Saving large media files to a local ZIP backup may exceed the CPU and memory capacity of your device and can take a very long time. LeOS Messenger will not send or receive messages while the backup is running. Continue anyway?
Cannot write to this directory. Please choose another one.
Your data will be saved in a ZIP file on your internal USB storage and can be restored on any Android device. Please enter a password to protect your data backup with.
If you switch or lose your device, nobody can restore your LeOS Messenger ID or your chats if you don’t have a backup. Please save your data using the appropriate backup options.

The text string displayed above or the QR code, along with the password that you have chosen, can be used to restore your ID on another device. You should copy it to a suitable place, share it by email or scan the QR code using another device.
Your ID export will be encrypted with a password. Use a combination of letters, numbers and symbols. Do not forget what you enter here!
Backup or restore in progress. Check notification for status information.

What kind of backup do you want to restore?

Learn more about backups in LeOS Messenger
The following text string can be used together with the chosen password to restore your Threema ID.
Please enter at least two answers for a poll.
Need to define at least two choices
Please make sure LeOS Messenger is online before closing a poll.
Warning: %1$s will not be able to participate in your poll.
Do you really want to delete %1$d poll(s)? You will not be able to recover the votes.
Poll closed. Tap to view results
Quickly create an online poll directly with LeOS Messenger. Schedule an event, create a survey or ask your friends anything you want.
Warning: %1$d contacts will not be able to participate in your poll.
Do you really want to keep battery optimization switched on for %1$s? %2$s will not work correctly.
Select “All Apps” in the drop down menu
Search for %s in the list and deactivate the optimization
Battery optimization prevents %1$s from working correctly when your phone falls into sleep mode. Please disable battery optimization for %2$s.
Missing permission to access biometrics data or hardware.
Biometrics are not available on this system.
No biometrics are enrolled in the system.
You cannot send messages to a blocked contact

string.description: A description of an action that a user of an accessibility service can perform to expand a bottomsheet halfway to its full height. [CHAR LIMIT=25]
string.name: bottomsheet_action_expand_halfway

resources.string: The contact is still a member or creator of a group conversation and therefore cannot be deleted. Leave or delete all groups that include this contact and try again.
You cannot send a message to an empty group
Do you really want to cancel and discard the recording?
PIN set. Tap here to change
This will create a clone of this group with you as the administrator. Continue?
The code you entered is not valid.
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Connection error, please try again later.
Would you like to add the new contact “%1$s” to your contact list?
Cancelling, required permissions are not granted

Data backups contain:

● Your ID and your key pair
● Contacts and trust levels
● Group memberships
● Chats
● Media and files (optional)

Data will be saved to an encrypted ZIP file. It is recommended to move the file away from the device after the backup has completed successfully.
Create a data backup to save all your data, including chats and media.
Database migration failed: Not enough space left on device.
If you continue, the files will be deleted and only thumbnails will be kept.
Do you want to leave this group and delete it completely? All messages will be removed.

Unless you have created a backup or exported and saved a copy of this ID, you will never be able to send or receive messages with this ID again.\n\nIf you don’t want to use this ID anymore, it is recommended to set a revocation password and revoke the ID on myid.threema.ch/revoke before deleting it.
Last warning: do you really want to delete your ID on this device?
Permanently delete your ID and all data on this device
Do you really want to delete this group? All messages will be removed.
Delete media and files older than:
Do you really want to delete this group completely? All messages will be removed and remaining members can no longer use the group.
In the following screen, make sure “%s” is included in the list of apps that can autostart. Tap the “back” button when you’re done.
In the following screen, make sure, “%s” is protected or excluded from any power management restrictions of your phone. Tap the “back” button when you’re done.
Some settings have been disabled by device policy
Would you like to discard changes?
Please agree to the %s terms of service first.
Download the latest version of your app store to continue.
Unable to check purchase history (error %s). Contact customer service.
Max. number of devices reached for using this app with this account (%s).
Max. number of devices reached for using this app with this account.
This app was not purchased using this account (%s). Purchase the app or switch to another account.
You have not purchased this app. Please purchase it first.
Please agree to the HUAWEI GameCenter Terms of Service first.
Network error. Please check your Internet connection and try again.
Please agree to the AppGallery Terms of Service first.
Please install the latest version of AppGallery first.
No Internet connection. Check your network settings and try again.
Please log in with your HUAWEI ID.
Failed to check purchase history, error code: %s. Please contact AppGallery customer service.
You (%s) have exceeded the maximum number of devices that can be used with this app. Please switch to another HUAWEI ID and purchase again.
You have reached the device limit for this app. Please try again with a different account.
Failed to check purchase history. Please try again.
Your LeOS Messenger ID is already linked to this email address
All messages in this chat will be deleted. Continue?
Enable storage access to see pictures and videos on your device
Unable to install. Please make sure \"Install unknown apps\" is enabled for %s.
Please enter the code from the verification SMS or mentioned in the phone call.
Choose a name for this list
Please enter your shop license key or click here to retrieve your key: https://shop.threema.ch/retrieve_keys
The chat will be sent as an encrypted zip file. Please choose a password:
Not enough memory to complete this action
Error. Media thumbnail could not be loaded
This code has expired. Please scan it again directly from the other user’s app.
Find faces in the image and have them blurred or covered with a smiley.
Selected file is not an image
Selected file is not a video
File is larger than the maximum of 50 MB
Warning: %1$d contacts cannot receive your file.
This device does not have a fingerprint sensor
Too many attempts. Please try again later.
No PIN, pattern, or password set.
This device does not support PIN, pattern, or password.
Enter at least two characters to search in messages
Are you sure you want to create an empty group?
Write a short message to the group admin %1$s why you want to join %2$s.
Share this link with people you would like to join the group. Consider the options below.
If active, you will receive requests within the group chat which you can accept or decline
The link expires after the set date.
Share this group link with people you would like to join the group: %s.
Join my LeOS Messenger group through the following link!: %s
You already have an open group request for %s through this link and an answer from the group admin is pending. Click on the request in the list if you want to try to resend.
You are about to send a group request for %1$s to admin %2$s. If this link was not invalidated, you will be added automatically to the group as soon as the admin\'s device receives your request.
Group request message cannot be empty
No sent group requests. Requests can be sent trough group links created by the group admin.
Your group request for %s was accepted
Your group request for %s was rejected because the group is full
Your group request for %s was rejected
Need to select at least one member to continue
You may not select more than %1$d group members
This chat is marked as a private chat. To enter it, please set up access protection first.

LeOS Messenger allows you to protect certain chats with a PIN and temporarily hide them from your message list. To enable private chats, please set a PIN or enable System Screen Lock (Android 6.0+) in settings.

string.description: Content description for an icon that appears in the title area of a dialog
string.name: icon_content_description

resources.string: The public key that you have scanned does not match the key that the server has stored for this ID. This means that somebody has manipulated the scanned code, and that the key should not be trusted.
This ID is already in your contact list
This image has already been added.
Unable to import backup file. Make sure there’s enough free space on internal memory.
Sent through open link… no message
You cannot send messages to an invalid contact
Not a valid LeOS Messenger OnPrem-ID

Hello,

I use %1$s, the secure instant messenger that protects users’ privacy.

My LeOS Messenger ID: https://threema.id/%2$s

Let’s communicate via %1$s!

Cheers,
LeOS Messenger. The secure messenger that protects our privacy
Hi! Let’s use %1$s to communicate in a safe and privacy-compliant way! My LeOS Messenger ID: https://threema.id/%2$s
To apply this setting, the app needs to restart.
Android SQLite API based on SQLCipher
This link was already configured and shared previously, changing this property is now impossible. Generate a new link with the property you need.
Location services are disabled. Would you like to enable them now?
Please enter at least three characters to search for a place.
No matching places found. Please modify your query.
No web browser installed on device, can\'t open web page.
Attribution icon. Activate to show attribution dialog.
Map compass. Activate to reset the map rotation to North.
Showing a Map created with Mapbox. Scroll by dragging two fingers. Zoom by pinching two fingers.
Location View. This shows your location on the map.
Provided OfflineRegionDefinition doesn\'t fit the world bounds: %s
Tap here to enter your passphrase
The master key is still locked. Would you like to try again?
Your master key is protected by a passphrase. Enter your passphrase to unlock the key.

LeOS Messenger keeps the passphrase in memory. If you need to re-enter the passphrase often, make sure that task killer and battery saver apps that may terminate LeOS Messenger prematurely, are disabled.
Set a passphrase to protect your master key. Note that you will have to enter it each time the app restarts.

No more than %d objects can be sent at once.
Could not open media file. It was deleted or not downloaded from the server.
You can also remove older messages completely.
The app store was unable to validate your purchase. If you use Google Play, please clear the data of the Google Play Store App and reboot your device.

MIUI disables sound, lights and floating notifications for all apps by default (except for some very popular apps deemed “important” by Xiaomi). You will have to manually enable these settings in your phone’s app-specific notification settings screen and repeat this procedure after each app update. Contact Xiaomi for more information.

Please disable "battery optimization" for %s to perform this task. As Xiaomi does not allow apps to call this settings screen directly, you will have to do this manually in your phone’s settings. Please contact Xiaomi support if you need assistance with disabling battery optimization.

MIUI 10 disables sound and lights for all newly created notification channels by default (except for some apps deemed “important” by Xiaomi). You will have to explicitly enable them for each channel in your phone’s app-specific notification settings screen. Contact your phone’s manufacturer for more information.
Important notice about notifications on MIUI
Your LeOS Messenger ID is already linked to this mobile number
Unable to access Android camera. Make sure permission to access the camera has been granted or restart your device.
Place a QR code inside the viewfinder rectangle to scan it.

resources.string: Tap to switch to selecting a year
%s is unable to receive messages in the background. Tap here to enable background data in settings.
Touch to fetch and view new incoming messages.

You have entered neither a mobile number nor an email address to link to your LeOS Messenger ID. You will not appear on your friends\’ contact lists. Do you really want to use LeOS Messenger anonymously?
You did not enter a mobile number to link to your LeOS Messenger ID. You will not appear on your friends\’ contact lists. Do you really want to use LeOS Messenger anonymously?

By moving your finger, you create random data (called entropy) that is used to generate the keypair associated with your new unique LeOS Messenger ID. The keypair consists of a public key that is distributed to your friends and a private key that is safely stored on your phone. Your friends will encrypt messages to you with your public key. Only the owner of the private key and nobody else is able to decrypt these messages.
You also created a key pair. The public key has been securely transmitted to our servers. The private key never leaves your device. This ensures that nobody else can read your messages.

By providing your phone number and email address, LeOS Messenger can help your friends find you automatically if they have you in their phone’s address book. The data will be stored in a one-way encrypted (hashed) form on our server. You can simply skip this step, if you would like to use LeOS Messenger completely anonymously.

By providing your phone number, LeOS Messenger can help your friends find you automatically if they have you in their phone’s address book. The number will be stored in a one-way encrypted (hashed) form on our server. You can simply skip this step, if you would like to use LeOS Messenger completely anonymously.

The nickname is used in push notifications on some devices or as an additional means of identifying you to users who do not yet have you in their address book. We recommend providing only your first name or a pseudonym. If you don’t set a nickname, we’ll use your LeOS Messenger ID by default.

If you enable this option, LeOS Messenger ID one-way encrypts (hashes) email addresses and phone numbers before sending them to the server to look for matching contacts. We do not store any addressbook data.
Link your mobile number and/or your email to your LeOS Messenger ID.
Link your mobile number to your LeOS Messenger\u00A0ID.
Move your finger on the screen to generate a new LeOS Messenger ID.
A stable Internet connection is required to create your unique LeOS Messenger ID. Please try again.
Your friends will see your nickname in their notifications
Either the phone number or the email address you entered are not valid.\nPlease correct before proceeding.
The phone number you entered is not valid.\nPlease correct before proceeding.
Or scan the QR code of your ID export
Switch on to see which friends are using Threema.
This is your LeOS Messenger ID:
Do you want to use your LeOS Messenger ID as your nickname?
Your LeOS Messenger ID works just like a phone number.\nYour friends can reach you through this ID.
No app found to open this file.
No map application found on this device
No archived chats.\nTo archive a chat, swipe it to the left in the messages list
You don’t have any contacts yet. Turn on synchronization (Settings > Privacy) or add contacts manually.
No group links. To create a group link, click on the add button on the bottom right or activate the default link in the group detail view.
No incoming group requests. These can be sent to you through group links which you can administer in the group detail view if you are the admin.
No admin-verified LeOS Messenger Work contacts found
No %s were found in this chat.
No media found in this chat
No media found on this device
This is not a LeOS Messenger specific QR-Code. The decoded content is:
No unread messages or PIN lock activated
No votes have been cast so far.
Free at least %1$s to receive the message
Hint: If you don’t add any group members, messages to this group will stay local. That’s ideal for securely storing notes, media or documents or transferring them to the desktop.
Notification channel for received group requests
%1$s joined %2$s. Tap here to send a message.
%1$d contacts joined %2$s: %3$s. Tap here to send them a message.
Notifications for LeOS Messenger have been disabled in the system settings. You will not be notified about new messages.
Only images or videos can be selected
The original file is no longer accessible. Please re-send the message.
The selected password for LeOS Messenger Safe is not secure and can be easily guessed by attackers. Please choose another one. Hint: Use a password composed of multiple individual words.
The password does not comply with the guidelines set by the administrator.
Remember what you enter here! Since %s does not save any passwords on severs, we cannot help you out, if you forget your PIN or password.
Your mobile number is not yet verified.
To take a picture, please allow access to the camera
To scan QR codes, LeOS Messenger needs access to the camera
For video calling, please allow access to the camera
To send contacts, allow LeOS Messenger permission to read contacts.
Please allow access to your contacts in order to be able to sync them.
To send a location, allow LeOS Messenger permission to access your position.
Allow permission to manage phone calls while using LeOS Messenger Call
To make encrypted calls and send voice messages, please allow access to the microphone.
To record a video, please allow access to the microphone
To save or send media, allow LeOS Messenger permission to access storage.
Picture in Picture mode is disabled for %s. Please enable it in system settings.
The app is locked. Cannot send.
Certificate Pinning Failure. Possible Man-in-the-middle attack. If you have an ad blocker, content filter, or firewall app installed such as “AdGuard”, please disable it for LeOS Messenger.
Certificate Pinning Failure. Please check if \"Entrust Root Certification Authority - G2\" is installed and activated in the credentials storage of your device.
Services not installed. Cannot switch to “push”.
To receive messages when LeOS Messenger is in the background please enable both Background data and Unrestricted data usage
Allow LeOS Messenger to run in the background so it can receive messages even when it’s not active.
Do not play any in-app sounds
Do not vibrate when receiving messages
Disallow IPv6 for LeOS Messenger Calls and Threema Web
Allow IPv6 for LeOS Messenger Calls and Threema Web
New messages do not trigger a notification when the master key is locked
New messages trigger a generic notification when the master key is locked
Use earpiece for voice message playback if proximity sensor is covered
Send Logfile to Threema for further analysis in case of problems
Clean up media, files and messages
Messages from IDs listed here will be ignored.
Anybody can send you a message. New contacts will be added automatically when the first message arrives.
Only people on your contact list can send you a message.
Set the sorting order of entries in the contact list
Use gray placeholders if contact picture is missing
Display multi-color placeholders if contact picture is missing
Display recent chats when sharing from other apps
Inhibit Smart Replies in Android notifications
Enter key adds a new line
The IDs listed here will be ignored when synchronizing contacts
Display a preview of the chat above the keyboard if there’s room
The keyboard covers the application if your device is in landscape mode
Display a list of recently added images in the attachments popup
Disable data collection for personalized suggestions (if supported by keyboard)
Require a passphrase to unlock local encryption
Time until the screen lock is activated
Check for new messages on push only
Check for new messages periodically (uses more battery!)
Hide profile pictures provided by your contacts
Show profile pictures provided by your contacts
The contacts selected in this list will receive your profile picture when you send them a message.
Re-register the device for push notifications with FCM/HMS
Reset contact-specific settings for read receipts and typing indicator to default
Save incoming pictures and videos as well as outgoing camera pictures in unencrypted form
Show all Threema IDs in your contact list
Show badges in bottom navigation tabs
Do not sync %s users with your device’s address book
Keep %s users in sync with your device’s address book
Select ringtone for incoming LeOS Messenger calls
Vibrate on incoming LeOS Messenger calls
Establish a direct connection, if possible, and only relay calls to unverified contacts through LeOS Messenger servers. May expose your IP address.
Force relaying all calls through Threema servers, protecting your IP address. May affect call quality.
Do not show thumbnails in app switcher and disable screenshots of select screens
For privacy reasons, thumbnails and screenshots are always prevented when "App lock" is enabled in security settings
Events and network information will be logged to the file debug_log.txt
The actual image quality depends on the network and the settings of the person you are talking to
Reject incoming mobile calls while a Threema Call is active.
Disable notifications and reject calls outside of working hours

If you proceed, we will attempt to call you immediately. Your verification code will be read to you twice. Note that we will only make one attempt, so please be sure that you are ready before you continue.
To use %s, please accept the Privacy Policy.\n\n(Requirement as per EU regulation 2016/679)
%1$s protects your privacy more rigorously than any other messenger. Find out more in our %2$s.
Who can see your profile picture?
If you continue, push messages will be disabled and LeOS Messenger will check for new messages every 15 minutes.
We could not find a push service on your device because Google Play Services are not installed or outdated. LeOS Messenger will check for new messages every 15 minutes.
The push token has been reset
The push token has been cleared
Scan the QR code of a contact to verify its identity. To display the code, ask your contact to tap on the profile picture in the upper left corner of the LeOS Messenger home screen.
Quoted message is no longer available
Could not send your review to the server. Please make sure you’re connected to the internet before trying again.
Please let us know what we can do to improve (optional).
Would you like to rate us on Google Play as well?
How do you rate LeOS Messenger?
Future messages from this contact will be discarded. Continue?
Do you really want to abort the mobile number verification?
Do you really want to delete this contact and all associated messages?
Do you really want to delete %1$d contacts and all associated chats?
Do you really want to remove this list and delete its messages?
Do you really want to delete %d group link(s)? People will not be able to send requests through it anymore. Previously received requests can still be accepted or rejected though.
Do you really want to delete %d group request(s)? You cannot respond to the requests once deleted.

If you continue, the messages will be permanently deleted. You will not be able to recover them.

To restore a data backup, first delete your LeOS Messenger ID from the \"My Profile\" screen.\n\nWhen the app restarts, choose \"Restore from backup\", \"Other restore options\", \"Data Backup\" and then select the data backup file you want to restore.

Password format for Threema Safe (regular expression)

Regular Expression (Regex) that defines the format of the password chosen by the user for Threema Safe. If not set, only a minimum length of 8 characters is enforced. The regular expression must be compatible with Java Pattern (Android) and NSRegularExpression (iOS)

Do you want to continue without enabling LeOS Messenger Safe? When using LeOS Messenger Safe, you can restore your LeOS Messenger ID, contacts and groups in case you lose access to your device.

All you need to chat is stored only on your device. You don’t have an account with us and we cannot help you out if you lose your phone or accidentally delete your data.\n\nLeOS Messenger Safe creates automatic backups of all the important data, including your keys, your contact list and your group memberships (but no message content), anonymously on a secure server of your choice.
Enable LeOS Messenger Safe to create automatic secure and anonymous backups of all your important data.

Do you really want to delete this desktop/web session?

The desktop app and the web client allow you to chat from your PC or notebook while giving you full access to all your contacts, media and chats, even past conversations.

All communication between phone and PC is fully end-to-end encrypted and uses a direct connection if both phone and PC are on the same network.

Please note: The desktop app / web client may cause some additional battery drain while it is active. You can enable or disable it at any time.
